title: Will explore electric vehicle export opportunities: Hyundai Motor India
description: Hyundai Motor India Ltd plans to introduce four electric vehicles, including the Creta EV by Q4 FY25, aiming for the mass and mass premium market segments. The company is open to exporting these EVs to similar emerging markets, depending on infrastructure and demand.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
